originalText.text: Fan…. TASTIC. I had a very URGENT issue and needed to leave my unsafe apartment and FAST. Keep in mind this is a 3 bedroom and fully furnished… they were able to not only move it out QUICK, but even made me feel safe seeing how they handled my valuables like they actually cared!!? top notch. Top G company

originalText.text: I work for next destination moving and I did a job rented my own truck for them perform the move successfully. It was never paid. The next day they sold the company and I was never paid for the moves that I made for them. I tried contacting next destination moving the new owners only to find out that that it was not sold at all. There are three partners and all three of them are crooks. Do not trust these people.

originalText.text: This is the Best Moving Company I have ever used. They were very Professional and I Loved how they packed all My Furniture. I Highly Recommend this Moving Company.

text.text: This is the Best Moving Company I have ever used. They were very Professional and I Loved how they packed all My Furniture. I Highly Recommend this Moving Company.

originalText.text: These guys were amazing.  Showed up on time and took great care of all out belongings. They even wrapped the delicate pieces with care. They had to walk across almost 50 meters of muddy grass in an apartment complex, but they did it with no complaint.  They worked quickly and professionally.  They came out and moved us with no issues, when another company wouldn’t even attempt it, and had cancelled on us as soon as they arrived and saw the grass.  We would definitely recommend these guys, and use them again if the need arose.

originalText.text: Very professional and fast movers; highly recommended local moving company. They got me a second team for the same day after the originally planned team got into a traffic accident (I hope they’re doing fine by the way). Everything was delivered carefully (even tv and mirrors), and they put all our furniture together as well. I could not be happier with their services. If I’d be nitpicking I would suggest having a better call center support. Otherwise, great!
